channel.title: Comments on: This Week in Genesis (4 September 2015)
channel.description: The best new WordPress Genesis things

item.title: By: Carlo
item.dc:creator: Carlo
item.description: Well done to all the contributors to version 2.2. It would have to be a record number of us for this release. I think the random order of credits isn't really fair because some contributed more than others (Rian). Now the big job is documenting all the new features!
item.content:encoded: Well done to all the contributors to version 2.2. It would have to be a record number of us for this release. I think the random order of credits isn’t really fair because some contributed more than others (Rian). Now the big job is documenting all the new features!
